data.eml:eml: Taxonomic status of Aphyocharaxavary Fowler, 1913, Aphyocharaxpusillus Guenther, 1868 and Chirodonalburnus Guenther, 1869 (Characiformes, Characidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article de Brito, Pamella Silva, Guimaraes, Erick Cristofore, Katz, Axel Makay, Piorski, Nivaldo Magalhaes, Ottoni, Felipe Polivanov (2018): Taxonomic status of Aphyocharaxavary Fowler, 1913, Aphyocharaxpusillus Guenther, 1868 and Chirodonalburnus Guenther, 1869 (Characiformes, Characidae). Zoosystematics and Evolution 94 (2): 393-399, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.94.28201, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zse.94.28201
